channel.title: The ending to Assassin's Creed (The first one)
channel.description:
Has anyone seen the ending to this game?
All I have to say is: THE FUCK?!
Anyways, what other games have terrible endings? Discuss.

item.title: The ending to Assassin's Creed (The first one)
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I didn’t really like the ending of Red Dead Redemption. Halo Reach ending was cool but disappointing. AC: Brotherhood’s ending makes no sense unless you get full synchronization, but sucked regardless. Ending of fallout 3 without the expansion packs is fucking awful. With the expansion packs it’s fucking awesome. ;D

Read full topic
item.source: The ending to Assassin's Creed (The first one)
